txt.en: Radagast can be found at the tree nursery just outside of Felegoth.\n\nYou should tell Radagast about what you have encountered at Caras Tilion.
Someone - or something - has come to dwell in Caras Tilion.

'This man you encountered in Caras Tilion is hair-raising, indeed, by your account. However, you must take me at my word that no one man holds the power to corrupt a river so.\n\n'Nay, even the Dark Lord himself, in the guise of the Necromancer, could not have done so in mere days. Long have I watched the dark workings of Dol Guldur and their effect upon these forests, and I know it to be so.'

'Whatever - whoever this dweller of Caras Tilion may be, he is aware of our presence already, I feel certain of it. If we tarry, he will be upon us.\n\n'The wisest counsel would have you leave me, with my injured leg, and go to Felegoth for aid. But I see in your face you have no intention of such a cautious course.'
You should stand by Oroniel's side and face the dweller of Caras Tilion.
Take me at my word that no one man holds the power to corrupt a river so.
'Do you feel the air getting colder? He approaches! Prepare yourself!'
